O3 Labs Style Guide

This Style Guide is living document of the elements and components that make up O3 Labs projects. Use it to enhance communication between team members and to assist with visual consistency and code maintainability.

CSS and JS updates are automatically added here when changes are made. HTML additions or updates will need to be added to the corresponding section manually.

Color Palette

Primary Colors

  • Brand Red
    #E00000

  • Medium Red
    #CC0000

  • Dark Red
    #990000

  • Medium Gray
    #666666

  • Dark Gray
    #1D1D1D

Supporting Colors

  • Gray F1
    #F1F1F1

  • Gray E1
    #E1E1E1

  • Gray C7
    #C7C7C7

  • Gray
    #999999

  • Light Blue
    #03B1EB

  • Medium Blue
    #0099CC

  • Dark Blue
    #037196

Curabitur viverra tincidunt vestibulum. Vivamus consectetur nulla tortor, ultricies commodo nulla semper vel.

Tables

The site includes a script that transforms tables into vertically aligned blocks for optimal viewing on small screens. The script uses <th> tags to provide lables for each table block. Table headings must be present on all tables. Note that <data-th> attributes are inserted dynamically and should not be included in base markup.

Column Title Column Title Column Title Column Title Column Title
Table Cell Item Table Cell Item Table Cell Item Table Cell Item Table Cell Item
